row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.JOB.START_EXEC@GENERIC
row.description: Start a Exec instance in a docker container

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Docker Base Url" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_BASE_URL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certification Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_CERTI_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Exec Instance Id" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_EXEC_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Detach" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_DETACH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Save docker response in a file" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SAVE_FILE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Folder path to save file" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Building output file path :IF &UC4RB_DKR_SAVE_FILE# = "YES" : IF &UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH# <> "" : SET &FINAL_FOLDER_PATH# = &UC4RB_DKR_FOLDER_PATH# : ELSE : SET &FINAL_FOLDER_PATH# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_DKR_FILENAME# = "execContainer-&$RUNID#.txt" :ENDIF
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.HTTP_TIMEOUT_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &UC4RB_DKR_ACTION_NAME# = "START_EXEC"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#, string, 10
: SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "&UC4RB_DKR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "&UC4RB_DKR_READ_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_DKR_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CERTI_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_DKR_EXEC_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "&UC4RB_DKR_DETACH#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_DKR_SAVE_FILE#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[9] = "&FINAL_FOLDER_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[10] = "&UC4RB_DKR_FILENAME#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_DKR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** START EXEC ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** START EXEC ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
! Publishing output file path
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 : IF &UC4RB_DKR_SAVE_FILE# = "YES" : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP",,"COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "OUTPUT_FILE_PATH" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_EXEC_FILE# = "&VALUE#" : PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_EXEC_FILE#,,"TOP" : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : ELSE : SET &UC4RB_DKR_EXEC_FILE# = "" : ENDIF :ELSE : SET &UC4RB_DKR_EXEC_FILE# = "" :ENDIF
